meta.description: The table breaks down complex bible references to a list of references to single verses. Also includes the OSISid format of the verse references.
meta.sampleQuery: use "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/vicmortelmans/yql-tables/master/bible/bibleref.xml" as bible.bibleref; select * from bible.bibleref where bibleref="john 3:16,17"
